channel.title: [Weapon] Zombie headshots with the Crossbow doesn't kill the headcrab
channel.description:
Instead it spawns it like when you kill the body. All other weapons instant kill the headcrab when fired upon a zombie, but the crossbow doesn't.
Small issue, but a bit weird.
